title: Everyone in my match dc'd
body: lol so I get a little spike start laning ping goes down, then dc'd checked my ping it's fine then I go back into league to find that 3 others on my team have dc'd and have no idea why and enemy team in all chat is like wtf? I've restarted client only to be unsuccessful in relogging.

replies.body:
Hey Rito, GJ on deleting my comment and giving me a forum warning, I know him in real life. I'll be a jerk to him as much as I want.

That said, I still don't have an answer for my issue. Funny.
Legit going to lol so hard if I lose lp or get a "leaver" match.
